meanings.definition: A pain in or around a tooth
meanings.sent1: My sister's toothaches kept her up all night.
meanings.sent2: I went to the dentist to get relief from my toothaches.
meanings.sent3: Even though he had toothaches, he couldn't resist eating ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The toothaches were like tiny hammers pounding on my jaw.
meanings.sent5: The sharp toothaches made it hard to focus on anything else.

meanings.definition: To experience pain in or around a tooth
meanings.sent1: She toothaches whenever she eats something cold.
meanings.sent2: I toothaches every time I bite down on that tooth.
meanings.sent3: He toothaches loudly whenever he has a cavity.
meanings.sent4: The toothaches in my mouth feel like tiny electric shocks.
meanings.sent5: The sudden toothaches made me wince in pain.
